sentences.en: a long tramp through the snow
sentences.cn: 雪地里的长途跋涉

sentences.en: A tramp does not see such a meal twice in the year, in the spike or out of it.
sentences.cn: 对于一个流浪汉而言，不论是在收容站还是在外面，如此丰盛的饭食他是见不到第二次的。

sentences.en: And can't you dress more decently—people will think you're a tramp.
sentences.cn: 你就不能穿得更体面一些吗——别人还以为你是个流浪汉呢。

sentences.en: Chaplin was at his best playing the little tramp.
sentences.cn: 卓别林扮演小流浪汉已达登峰造极的境界.

sentences.en: Five minutes inside the soup-kitchen in Hackney, east London, and I immediately understand what Orwell meant - that the "typical tramp" does not exist.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦东面哈克尼的汤棚里呆了五分钟，我立刻明白了奥威尔那句“‘典型的流浪汉’不存在”是什么意思。

sentences.en: He heard the slow, heavy tramp of feet on the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他听到楼梯上传来缓慢沉重的脚步声。

sentences.en: He took out his wallet and gave five pounds to the tramp.
sentences.cn: 他拿出钱包,给了流浪者5英镑.

sentences.en: He tramped the streets looking for work.
sentences.cn: 他在街上四处奔走，寻找工作。

sentences.en: I heard the tramp of the marching soldiers.
sentences.cn: 我听见了行军士兵重重的脚步声.

sentences.en: I met a tramp and gave him some money on my way home.
sentences.cn: 我回家的路上碰到了一个流浪汉并给了他一些钱。

sentences.en: She wants to go for a tramp in the country.
sentences.cn: 她想去乡间远足.

sentences.en: The boys took a tramp together over the hills.
sentences.cn: 男孩们一起徒步爬那些山岗.

sentences.en: The old tramp shambled wearily up the path.
sentences.cn: 这个年老的流浪汉疲惫不堪,蹒跚地走上了小路.

sentences.en: The tramp frightened her by talking to her.
sentences.cn: 那个流浪汉跟她讲话把她吓了一跳.

sentences.en: the tramp of marching feet
sentences.cn: 行进中沉重的脚步声

sentences.en: The tramp produced a stump of candle from his deep pockets.
sentences.cn: 流浪汉从深口袋里掏出了一截蜡烛。

sentences.en: The tramp reviled the man who drove him off.
sentences.cn: 流浪汉辱骂那位赶他走开的人.

sentences.en: The tramp was arrested for vagrancy.
sentences.cn: 这个流浪汉因流浪而被捕.

sentences.en: The walk involved tramping through mud.
sentences.cn: 走这段路要在泥地中跋涉。

sentences.en: They put on their coats and tramped through the falling snow.
sentences.cn: 他们穿上大衣，在落雪中脚步沉重地缓缓走着。

sentences.en: Tramp, tramp , tramp , columns of militiamen marched by in perfect step.
sentences.cn: 一队队民兵欻欻地走过去,非常整齐.

sentences.en: You silly boy; why did you tramp about so long in the cold?
sentences.cn: 你这个傻孩子，为什么大冷天走这么大老远的路？

words.tran_cn: 流浪；践踏，踩；脚步沉重地行走

trans.tran_cn: 流浪汉，妓女，游民，流浪汉，徒步旅行，远足
trans.tran_en: someone who has no home or job and moves from place to place, often asking for food or money

trans.tran_cn: 流浪；践踏，踩；脚步沉重地行走
trans.tran_en: to walk somewhere slowly and with heavy steps
